name: udp-log
hubDesc: Send request and response logs to an UDP server
description: Log request and response data to an UDP server.

fields.name: host
fields.help: The IP address or host name to send data to.

fields.name: port
fields.help: The port to send data to on the upstream server

fields.name: timeout
fields.help: An optional timeout in milliseconds when sending data to the upstream server
